description: My favorite IDE for Micropython and ESP32/8266, Raspberry Pi Pico. Flash, code, upload, run. That's it.
ok thankuy
great for understanding the basics
Don't wast your time
I feel like Thonny is just a revamped Python IDLE. However, it does provide more than enough tools for any developer. What I don't like is that it feels like it always fills in commands for me.

It's IDLE but with some ease of use features. No autofill, the only IDE features are automatic tabbing and the ability to run apps. If you're looking for something simple, get this. Otherwise, get PyCharm or something like that.

Could have been much better.
Unfortunately it is very limited and has a bug that won't allow the program to end without killing it.
I would still prefer vim, but the debugger thingy is nice
It is very simple and help beginners debug step by step, look at the values of the variables and see how things work, and what is going wrong

THONNY ROCKS! There is truly no IDE out there that is: 
 1. Easier to use right from the get go, 
 2. More straightforward and WYSIWYG-like, and
 3. More forgiving on beginners
hands down, period, no contest, hang it up fellas, and that's all she wrote. K? K.
summary: There is NO Python IDE out there that compares!

description:
Great IDE to get started and I found the way the debugger step through code very useful to understand the code.
The GUI and setting are simple and nice. 
Highly recommended.

-1 star because the latest version must be obtained from the website. Cannot have split view either and some basic code completion is not possible. Highlighting selected text throughout would be very helpful to quickly navigate.
this is the only python program i use
It comes bundled with micro python. Very ESP8266 programming.
very nice IDE if you use micropython on ESP dev board, you can easily upgrade/download files on your ESP directly from Thonny
summary: very nice if you use micropython on ESP dev board

description: this is a light weight ide and it will come handy and the main reason that i use this is for micropython, other ide's don't provide anything for micropython
Raspberrypi Pico support.

when i click on the icon of thonny app 
it does start and shutdown immediately i tried to reinstall it many time but it doesnt fix it 

my operating system : Linux Ubuntu 20
summary: i have an issue running thonny app

description: Easy to use, and does not overwhelm the novice with excess shortcuts and undesirable features. Highly Recommend

Still 3.2.7!!
The latest 3.3.3 onward support PICO!
"sudo apt install thonny" to install the latest!
run thonny through terminal!

Being using ti for awhile but now when i start it then it shuts down
It is simple and very god for anyone that want to learn Python. Easy and step by step debugging, great for learning and testing how the code is working.

Great software, zap files back and forth to micropython boards, run the REPL, run bit pytho; nice.
Starts fast and seems lightweight. Also stays nice and dark, albeit with some funky syntax colors. For folks using the 
upy boards, definitely worth at least trying; my go-to. Much simpler than rshell, ampy all of 'em. Only thing I've found
that is close is PyLoader, but the UI on this is light-years ahead. Get it; use it; love it. Thanks Thonny!
this is the first ide which i used to learn python and the is my longest review everit is very easy to use and i thin it is even better than pycharm and visual studio
summary: this is the best ide for python

description: I loved it very much but I dropped one star cos it wont work anymore not sure why , just like any other person I did have the same problem. Not sure what causing it. let us know if any one has any solutions available.
why can i not download?

description: Works ideally as was intended to

Works very well as a quick-to-use IDE. Ships with python on other systems, portable, fairly customizable. I prefer Geany for heavier workloads and projects other than python; text, js, csv... but Thonny is great for simple scripting and testing.
everything is always outdated with ubuntu, nothing actually works, all your design decisions are non functional and I hate you.
recommended to start your python jorney
it is wonderfull
Für die ersten Schritte auf jedenfall sehr Hilfreich.
Facil de usar facil de configurar muy parecido al idle de python repecto a sus funciones
lokuroteeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee

Me gusta Thonny todo bien
super simple y fácil de usar para empezar a programar en python

description: Parfait pour les débutants et pour programmer en CircuitPython et MicroPython
très simple et épuré
c'est super comme appli mais on ne peut pas changer la langue ou avoir accès a des paramètre supplémentaire
summary: je recommande mais pour la langue, non

description: J'ai pris thonny car je le trouve très agréable et bon sur une machine windows. Cependant, il manque le mode sombre ici et c'est une feature importante a mon avis...
Léger et rapide, idéal pour des projets simples ! On peut désormais choisir sa langue et de nombreux thèmes de couleurs !
summary: Super depuis qu'il y a le DARKTHEME

description:
Parfait pour débutants et pour faire de simples scripts rapidement. 
Le gestionnaire de modules est très pratique.
Application simple et bien conçu
summary: Très bon logiciel ,je l'utilise pour programmer un esp8266

description:
Simple et sans avoir 45 milles options.
contrairement à d'autres logiciels où il faut 20 ans pour comprendre le fonctionnement.
ça marche ap le reuf
Simple et épuré, fait son boulot pour du dev simple sur Python. Bug en mode doubling sur raspi : les icons sont trop petite pour etre utilisées.
Ребята, разрабы, не портье хороший язык своим приложеним. Жду когда вы начнете собирать деньги для армии Ирака, Ливии и Сирии.
Прекрасное приложение. Все что нужно (лично для меня)
Имеет я думаю самый лучьший debuger-отладчик, с помощью которого понятен весь выполняемый скрипт --- всё по полочкам преподносит отладчик.
summary: Имеет я думаю самый лучьший debuger-отладчик

description: По сотоянию на момент отзыва программа под ubuntu испортили. Раньше нельзя было поставить точки остановки, а теперь еще и постоянные ошибки от Thonny. какието-то внутренние ошибки самой оболочкм.
Использую для MicroPython + Raspberry PI 2040 Connect.
хрень фашисткая
very very very good

It is works fine with my Raspberry PICO. By import machine, utime and ssd1306 oled module and assign some code, the Pico runs automatically with my main.py, which means no more painful hard code work. I love it.
